Stakeholders

KHETI connects multiple stakeholders in agri-food-ecosystem to make our food systems more transparent, resilient, sustainable and financially viable. Multi stakeholder collaboration is also vital to keep our farmers and consumers happy and healthy.

Lets collaborate to co-create sustainable food systems!!!

Suppliers / Service Providers

Farmers need range of farm inputs and services to be able to produce. Kheti delivers these products and services to farm-gate of our farmers in the network. If you are the companies producing and/or providing any products and services to the farmers you have landed on the right platform. Let's create a transparent and fair supply system.

Farmers Market Vendors

There are many farms, local & sustainable food vendors, farmers market organizers who are working restless to create local food systems. Kheti wants to add value to all the works we are putting effort on. Now, you can increase outreach to more consumers through our digital farmers market experiences. Let's increase the market share of local food jointly!!!

Local Food Companies

One biggest problem the local food companies face is the market competition with the food corporations having global presence. Nevertheless, we, the local food companies, are the ones who drive the local economy benefiting both smallholder farmers and consumers. Join Kheti, we are providing this platform to increase the consumers base.

Associations

Either you are the associations working with farmers network or with the network of potential consumers, Kheti adds value to your network in various ways. For associations working with farmers, let's collaborate to make our farms productive and profitable. For associations with consumers network, lets co-create conscious consumption practices for healthy society.

Banks /
Financial Institutions

Easy access to finances and insurance facilities play very important role in the success of the farming and food sector. BFIs can work with Kheti, with thousands of our farmers network, to bring your services to them while we support farmers to become more profitable and productive thus assisting in securing your investments.

Goverment

Government institutions need data to build effective policies as well as to bring programs and subsidies to the appropriate farming communities. Kheti bridges this gap by providing farmers success records through its smart farm management tool to the institutions while you can channel your support to the needy and rightful farmers.

Development Partners

Development partners (I/NGOs) are working to build multi-layer support system to farming communities as well as in food sector ranging from promoting sustainable farming, creating market driven economies of local produce to bringing consumer awareness on nutrition and good food. Kheti is the right partner to execute your programs.

Research Institutes

Research institutes and universities benefit through Kheti in multiple ways. Collaborate with us to create case studies for your students/audiences, make research with our farming and consuming communities to find new ways of production and consumption patterns, build scientific background to various topics around farming and food etc.
